'''{{class|Actor}}'''
{{c|int '''GetAmmoCapacity''' (class<Ammo> ''type'')}}
==Usage== Retrieves the {{Property|Inventory.MaxAmount|max amount}} of the specified {{Class|Ammo|ammo type}} in the calling actor's inventory.
===Parameters=== *{{c|class<Ammo> '''type'''}} :The class name of the ammo type.
===Return value=== The current max amount of the ammo type in the inventory. If the ammo type does not exist in the inventory, then its default max amount, as defined in its definition, is returned. If the ammo type is an invalid class, the function returns 0.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
==See also== *[[SetAmmoCapacity_(Actor_function)|SetAmmoCapacity]]
